Articles.Content: So,the new Annihilation game alpha was released few months ago.But I just got it from my father as a birthday present.I'm so excited ! What'ya think about it?

The concept trailer was amazing, and I've watched a few "Lets Play" videos of its progress so far. It looks like they are making some good headway towards delivering what they showed. I particularly liked the idea of being able to tailor the solar system to your liking before starting a match. However it's lack of stability has kept me from buying it thus far. I don't mind a glitchy or incomplete beta experience, but constant CTD is too much of a deal-breaker, and that still happens quite often from what Ive seen around. Once it gets a bit more stable I'll probably pick it up though, it looks like a ton of fun.
If its has as enjoyable battles as Total Annihilation I'll totally buy it, but all I've read of it how much is crashes and I'm not ready to spend my money on it.
